Detailed Description

IPEndPoint describes an end point by IP and Port.

Member Function Documentation

const IPAddress* gaia::net::IPEndPoint::getAddress ( ) const

gets the IP address of the calling instance.

IPEndPoint will hold the ownership. If caller need to hold ownership of one address instance, call may call clone() of IPAddress.

Returns:
end point's address in IPAddress.
